title: Add a cooldown to taunt/laugh & Masteries icon
body: Always tought that those kinda things are unnecessary & really annoying since when you get to lane & you get spammed by that every sec until lane phase is finished..., so i tought about adding a cooldown to them would be great idea & won't hurt anyone,& so that i don't have to disable the audio sometimes to play in peace

replies.body: Hmmmmm that could be a decent idea if it's bothering you that much. Possibly adding the option to disable other peoples emotes? You should take this idea over to the [**Client Discussion**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion) board to get a little more feedback on it!
